column1: 1. What did Einstein think of Planck's view on consciousness?
2. Isn't it true that later in life Einstein changed his views on both the uncertainty principle and on the nature of consciousness?
3. How are Planck's views on consciousness related to the uncertainty principle?
4. In what ways does the double slit experiment support Planck's view on consciousness?
5. It seems to me that experiments that are highly suggestive of mine matter interactions contradict the materialist interpretation of the double slit experiment would you agree
